name: Bey Blade Champions [PvP AR]
description:
Bey Blade Champions is multiplayer augmented reality game developed by LoG Games, in which 2 players battle in an arena with the help of spinner tops. The game is currently compatible with selected android devices since the game was developed in Unity using ARCore. Click the link below to check whether your device is compatible with this game or not : 

https://developers.google.com/ar/discover/supported-devices

The game is currently being developed for iOS and will be available soon.
